placeholders.HERO_SUBHEADING_TEXT: Buy, sell, and trade premium keyboards with enthusiasts worldwide. Find your dream keys or cash in on your collection.
placeholders.FOOTER_TEXT: © 2023 KeySwap. Connecting keyboard enthusiasts one click at a time.
placeholders.NEWSLETTER_SUBHEADING_TEXT: Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive trading insights and keyboard shortcuts
placeholders.ABOUT_MISSION_STATMENT: Our mission is to empower traders with lightning-fast execution through innovative keyboard-based trading solutions.
placeholders.ABOUT_VISION_STATEMENT: We envision a trading world where every keystroke translates to a strategic market move, maximizing efficiency and profits.
placeholders.ABOUT_VALUES_STATEMENT: Speed, Precision, Innovation, and User-Centric Design are the core values that drive our keyboard trading platform.
placeholders.CONTACT_SUBHEADER_TEXT: Have questions or need support? Our team is just a keystroke away.
placeholders.FAQ_QUESTION_01_TEXT: What makes keyboard trading faster than traditional methods?
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_01_TEXT: Keyboard trading eliminates the need for mouse clicks, allowing for rapid order placement and execution through customizable hotkeys and shortcuts.
placeholders.FAQ_QUESTION_02_TEXT: Is KeyStroke Trader suitable for beginners?
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_02_TEXT: Absolutely! While our platform offers advanced features for experienced traders, we provide comprehensive tutorials and practice modes for beginners to master keyboard trading.
placeholders.FAQ_QUESTION_03_TEXT: Can I customize the keyboard shortcuts?
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_03_TEXT: Yes, KeyStroke Trader offers full customization of keyboard shortcuts, allowing you to tailor the platform to your unique trading style and preferences.
placeholders.FAQ_SUBHEADER_TEXT: Find quick answers to common questions about our keyboard trading platform
